title: Bloomify
description: A house plant care app that allows users to explore new plants and setup watering reminders for their existing plants.

title: NutriSmart
description: A nutritional analysis app for health-conscious individuals.

title: Weather Forecast Dashboard
description: A weather forecast dashboard that provides current weather and 5-day forecast.

title: Team Profile Generator
description: A Node.js command-line application that takes in information about employees on a software engineering team and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.

title: Javascript Game
description: A simple javascript game that tests your knowledge of javascript.

title: Password Generator
description: Generates a random password based on user input.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: A simple work day scheduling app.
